meanings.definition: The process of heating something up.
meanings.sent1: During the thermalizations, the ice turned into water.
meanings.sent2: The thermalizations of the oven made the cookies golden brown.
meanings.sent3: The thermalizations of the sun made the snowman sweat.
meanings.sent4: The thermalizations in the room were like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the thermalizations from the fireplace across the room.

meanings.definition: The act of making something thermal.
meanings.sent1: She conducted the thermalizations of the metal to test its properties.
meanings.sent2: The thermalizations of the blanket kept the baby warm all night.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at thermalizations on the ice cream left it melted.
meanings.sent4: The thermalizations of the tea transformed it from cold to hot.
meanings.sent5: The thermalizations of the room made it cozy and inviting.

meanings.definition: The state of being thermally activated.
meanings.sent1: The thermalizations of the engine indicated it was ready to go.
meanings.sent2: The thermalizations of the body after exercise can be beneficial.
meanings.sent3: The thermalizations of the cat after a nap made it seek a cooler spot.
meanings.sent4: The thermalizations of the volcano warned of an imminent eruption.
meanings.sent5: The thermalizations of the metal rod showed it was conducting heat efficiently.
